document.full_text: dozens of prisoners escaped from a tunisian jail late wednesday, the official tap news agency said thursday, in the latest in a series of mass prison breakouts since an uprising ousted the president in january.
document.title: dozens escape tunisian jail in new breakout: tap
lines_and_colors: dozens of prisoners escaped from a tunisian jail late wednesday, the official tap news agency said thursday, in the latest in a series of mass prison breakouts since an uprising ousted the president in january.
